about_the_game:
In the aftermath of the Catastrophe, a mysterious carbon-silicon mineral known as Corite has breathed new life into Earth's depleated energy industry. But its gift came with a curse — its pathogenic nature and uncontrollable spread are slowly devouring the last habitable spaces on the planet. Within 30 years, the heavily polluted Marcens Zones threaten to engulf the entire globe, pushing humanity to the brink of extinction.

Amid the chaos of this catastrophic event, you find yourself thrust into the role of an unlikely hero — a pilot of the third-generation BREAK Striker. Now, you must navigate an uncertain path, one fraught with peril and discovery. But you are not alone. A secretive organization known as S.H.A.D.O.W. has extended an offer, one that could change the fate of both you and the world.

Assault, melee, sniper, reconnaissance, support... Choose your preferred mech and take on enemies across three distinct combat modes: 3v3 Deathmatch, 6v6 Hero Shooter, or PvPvE Extraction Shooter.

3v3 or 6v6

Engage in 3v3 Deathmatch, where no price is too great for victory, or take on the 6v6 Hero Shooter, where personal skill and team tactics are key to achieving mission objectives and turning the tide of battle!

Prepare for adrenaline-pumping battles, lightning-fast maneuvers, and explosive firepower. Take the battle up close with an imposing battle-axe, unyielding halberd, or agile laser sword in epic brawls. Precisely block close-range strikes and deliver lethal parries. Prefer to keep your distance? Penetrate enemy defenses with stealthy sniper shots, energy blasts, or rain death from above by showering your enemies with missiles.

PvPvE Extraction

Choose to go in alone or form a tactical squad of three mechs to infiltrate the largest Corite resource zone, the Mashmak Islands. Pilot your third-generation BREAK Strikers and charge through a 200-square-kilometer combat area to carry out reconnaissance missions under fire. As you face hostile garrison forces and the rapidly spreading Corite pulse storms, race against time to complete your objectives, acquire special materials for upgrading your arsenal, and return safely!

Customization

Stand out on the battlefield with mechs and pilots designed by you! Choose from a multitude of colors, decals, and unique patterns to create a truly one-of-a-kind mecha masterpiece. With a vast range of physical features and an abundance of wardrobe options, design a pilot that reflects your own unique style.

Characters

Explore your S.H.A.D.O.W. hangar and discover its secrets. As you advance through the game, unlock a roster of characters with rich backstories, and join forces with legendary pilots to secure humanity’s survival. Along the way, discover new pilots—each with their own distinct stories and motivations—driven to break free and forge a new path by your side.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1300X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 / Radeon RX 570 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700K / AMD Ryzen 7 5700X3D or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 / Radeon RX 5700XT or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Squad up in Mecha BREAK, a multiplayer third-person shooter offering players three unique game modes filled with high-octane ground and aerial combat. Choose from diverse classes, customize your appearance, and battle hostile mechs across treacherous terrain. Are you ready for the ultimate showdown?

English*, Simplified Chinese*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese*, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
*languages with full audio support
